comments.body: It should probably be noted somewhere that this routine does not yet handle 'friend of friends' (and of course, also not yet, the fact that a TTree/TChain can be in multiple place in this friend (indirect) collection).
will add a note in the doxygen doc
Opening a file can be an 'expensive' operation if the file is remote.  However it might be to hard to update the code to avoid 'wasting' this opening by using this file(handle) later on.
That is a fair point, but anyway this search for the name of the tree (and consequently the opening of the file) will only happen when the user does not specify that name.
